subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ron English accepted an offer from Louisville Coach Steve Kragthorpe to be his defensive coordinator. It is the same job English had at Michigan, where the incoming coach, Rich Rodriguez, fired all of Lloyd Carr’s assistants. English agreed to a two-year contract with Louisville, which fired the defensive coordinator Mike Cassity after a disappointing 6-6 season. The Cardinals finished 84th in the country in total defense and 93rd in scoring defense.
